products.name: Dragée Box Hazelnut
products.description: Roasted and caramelised Piedmontese hazelnuts coated in dark Grand Cru chocolate from Madagascar.

products.name: Raspberry Truffle Delight
products.description: Indulge in the delightful combination of luscious raspberry puree infused with smooth milk chocolate ganache, enrobed in a rich dark chocolate shell.

products.name: Salted Caramel Praline
products.description: Experience the perfect balance of sweet and salty with our artisanal salted caramel praline, made with creamy caramel and encased in velvety milk chocolate.

products.name: Dark Chocolate Espresso Beans
products.description: Awaken your senses with the intense flavor of dark chocolate enrobing premium roasted espresso beans, creating a truly indulgent treat.

products.name: White Chocolate Passionfruit Bonbon
products.description: Tantalize your taste buds with the exotic blend of white chocolate ganache infused with tangy passionfruit essence, enclosed in a delicate white chocolate shell.

products.name: Mint Chocolate Bliss
products.description: Refreshingly cool mint-flavored dark chocolate ganache meets the velvety embrace of premium milk chocolate, delivering a blissful confectionery experience.

products.name: Almond Marzipan Delight
products.description: Savor the timeless delight of almond marzipan coated in a thin layer of bittersweet chocolate, crafted with love and tradition.

products.name: Orange Zest Chocolate Bar
products.description: Embark on a zesty journey with our orange-infused dark chocolate bar, where citrusy notes dance harmoniously with deep cocoa flavors.

products.name: Toffee Crunch Milk Chocolate
products.description: Crunchy toffee bits nestled in velvety milk chocolate create a symphony of textures and tastes that will satisfy your sweet cravings.

products.name: Chili Infused Dark Chocolate
products.description: Ignite your palate with the intriguing blend of spicy chili flakes embraced by the deep intensity of dark chocolate, a daring and delectable experience.

products.name: Hazelnut Praline Milk Chocolate
products.description: Indulge in the creamy goodness of hazelnut praline wrapped in smooth milk chocolate for a delightful taste experience.

products.name: Raspberry White Chocolate
products.description: Experience the exquisite harmony of tart raspberries and sweet white chocolate that will captivate your senses with every bite.

products.name: Mint Chocolate Chip
products.description: Enjoy the refreshing combination of minty freshness and rich chocolate chips in this cool and satisfying treat.

products.name: Salted Caramel Dark Chocolate
products.description: Delight in the perfect balance of sweet and salty with luscious caramel enrobed in decadent dark chocolate.

products.name: Almond Crunch White Chocolate
products.description: Savor the satisfying crunch of almonds enveloped in velvety white chocolate for a delightful taste sensation.

products.name: Orange Zest Dark Chocolate
products.description: Elevate your taste buds with the zesty infusion of orange peel and rich dark chocolate, a bold and citrusy delight.
